gems.name: dsu
gems.info: Get ready to jazz and snazz up your daily stand-ups with dsu, the agile developer's new best friend! This handy command-line gem is all about making your Daily Stand-Up (DSU) participation smooth, fun, and super efficient. Effortlessly create, update, and organize your DSU entries, turning the task of tracking and sharing your daily activities into a breeze. With its intuitive interface and smart date management, dsu ensures youâ€™re always ready to inform your team about your recent progress and upcoming plans. Perfect for command-line tool enthusiasts, dsu brings a dash of simplicity and fun, fun, fun to your daily agile routine!
